price: Dijeron [los Mensajeros]: "Nuestro Señor sabe que realmente somos Mensajeros.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
